sub_title: Financial Analyst II at Elsevier | CGMA/CIMA candidate | Finance Business Partner
summary: A young and vibrant Finance professional with Financial Economics master's degree specializing in Financial Analysis. A true team player with strong educational background, technical/programming skills and high performance in roles given. In addition, a quick learner with high motivation and dedication combined with internationaly oriented and wide experience gained in the area over the past years. As an enthusiastic and curious person, I am always eager to learn something new and be ready for the new challenges. Future CGMA candidate.

[{'company': {'id': 3027, 'name': 'Elsevier', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQFvlGwwa4KXFA/company-logo_400_400/0/1688142511630?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=wKSwKv6rIJKKj6tGlzeI42wL-UV3k2iPSKLp9KgoZB8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/elsevier/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Elsevier', 'description': 'As a part of Business Decision Support team, I closely work with business to transform their ideas to the numbers and play a role of bridge between Financial reporting teams and the business.

• As a Financial Analyst in Business Decision support team, I actively and directly interact with business to help them understand their cost, revenue and sales numbers and give them insights on the financial implications of their future decisions.

• Apart from monthly management reporting, I assist business with ad-hoc requests and provide them with additional any other insight required for Open Access.

• Working with the cost COE and Revenue&Sales COE, I build up full year Budget and periodic Forecasts for Open Access.

• In addition to supporting business, I closely work with my team members on improvement of current processes, systems and reporting for Global STM Journals.

• As a young and technology oriented professional, I work with different teams and the business to come up with new ideas and better planning, forecasting and control tools for complex Open Access management reporting.', 'title': 'Financial Analyst II - Finance Business Partner - Global STM Journals Open Access', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'Elsevier', 'description': 'Financial Analyst under Indirect Cost team to support multiple business units around the world with hundreds of FTEs and the implementation of different projects in the cost team.

• As a Financial Analyst in cost team, I actively interact with business partners to help them understand their cost drivers and provide valuable insights to help them to make informed decisions.

• Apart from monthly management reporting, I assist business partners with ad-hoc requests and provide them with additional insights specific to their business units.

• Working with the cost team and my business partners, I help them to build up full year Budget and periodic Forecasts for the labour and OPEX items.

• In addition to supporting business partners, I closely work with Director of Cost & Revenue team on preparation of management reports and cost presentations to CFO, audit and other high management team.

• Seeking for continuous improvement, I actively participate in Better Forecasting project with Finance Directors, HR, Talent Acquisition leaders and different business unit leaders to improve Labour and FTE forecasting process. I have actively contributed to the creation and maintenance of new forecasting model to simplify and increase accuracy of current model.

• As a young leader with technology oriented mindset , I have come up with ideas and volunteered for the automation of different manual Excel templates, payroll analysis and other business unit specific processes.', 'title': 'Financial Analyst -
